  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101551</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using operations research to address aviation security problems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden von von Unternehmensforschung, um 
Luftfahrtsicherheit Probleme zu adressieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation de la recherche opérationnelle pour 
adresser des problèmes de sécurité d'aviation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando a pesquisa de operações dirigir-se a 
problemas da segurança da aviação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando ricerca di funzionamenti per richiamare i 
problemi di sicurezza di aeronautica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση της έρευνας διαδικασιών για να εξετάσει 
τα προβλήματα εναέριας ασφάλειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar la investigación de operaciones para tratar 
problemas de la seguridad de la aviación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A news report featuring the research of Professor Sheldon H. Jacobson at the University of Illinois, on applying operations research methodologies to address aviation security problems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Nachrichtenreport, der die Forschung des 
Professors Sheldon H. Jacobson an der Universität von Illinois, auf 
dem Anwenden von von Unternehmensforschung Methodenlehren an den 
Adresse Luftfahrt-Sicherheit Problemen kennzeichnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un état de nouvelles comportant la recherche de 
professeur Sheldon H. Jacobson à l'université de l'Illinois, sur 
s'appliquer des méthodologies de recherche opérationnelle aux 
problèmes de sécurité d'aviation d'adresse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um relatório de notícia que caracteriza a 
pesquisa do professor Sheldon H. Jacobson na universidade de Illinois,
sobre aplicar metodologias da pesquisa de operações aos problemas da
segurança da aviação do endereço.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un rapporto di notizie che caratterizza la ricerca
del professor Sheldon H. Jacobson all'università di Illinois, 
sull'applicazione delle metodologie di ricerca di funzionamenti ai 
problemi di sicurezza di aeronautica di indirizzo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια έκθεση ειδήσεων που χαρακτηρίζει την έρευνα του 
καθηγητή Sheldon H. Jacobson στο πανεπιστήμιο του 
Ιλλινόις, σχετικά με τη "Εφαρμογή" των ερευνητικών μεθοδολογιών 
διαδικασιών για να εξετάσει τα προβλήματα εναέριας ασφάλειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un informe de noticias que ofrece la 
investigación de profesor Sheldon H. Jacobson en la universidad de 
Illinois, al aplicar metodologías de la investigación de operaciones
a los problemas de la seguridad de la aviación del direccionamiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
